an3.123:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kusinarayam viharati baliharane vanasande.
an3.123:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharati.
an3.123:2.2: Tamenam gahapati va gahapatiputto va upasankamitva svatanaya bhattena nimanteti.
an3.123:2.4: So tassa rattiya accayena pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena tassa gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va nivesanam tenupasankamati; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidati.
an3.123:2.5: Tamenam so gahapati va gahapatiputto va panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappeti sampavareti.
an3.123:3.2: ‘sadhu vata myayam gahapati va gahapatiputto va panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappeti sampavareti’ti.
an3.123:3.4: ‘aho vata mayam gahapati va gahapatiputto va ayatimpi evarupena panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappeyya sampavareyya’ti.
an3.123:3.5: So tam pindapatam gathito mucchito ajjhosanno anadinavadassavi anissaranapanno paribhunjati.
an3.123:3.6: So tattha kamavitakkampi vitakketi, byapadavitakkampi vitakketi, vihimsavitakkampi vitakketi.
an3.123:3.7: Evarupassaham, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dinnam na mahapphalanti vadami.
an3.123:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharati.
an3.123:4.2: Tamenam gahapati va gahapatiputto va upasankamitva svatanaya bhattena nimanteti.
an3.123:4.4: So tassa rattiya accayena pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena tassa gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va nivesanam tenupasankamati; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidati.
an3.123:4.5: Tamenam so gahapati va gahapatiputto va panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappeti sampavareti.
an3.123:5.2: ‘sadhu vata myayam gahapati va gahapatiputto va panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappeti sampavareti’ti.
an3.123:5.4: ‘aho vata mayam gahapati va gahapatiputto va ayatimpi evarupena panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappeyya sampavareyya’ti.
an3.123:5.5: So tam pindapatam agathito amucchito anajjhosanno adinavadassavi nissaranapanno paribhunjati.
an3.123:5.6: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi, abyapadavitakkampi vitakketi, avihimsavitakkampi vitakketi.
an3.123:5.7: Evarupassaham, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dinnam mahapphalanti vadami.
